title.rendered: Signature Global Park 1 Phase 2: Live in a Luxurious Home

content.rendered:
Have you ever imagined what a beautiful life it would be amidst a green belt surrounded by the picturesque view of the Aravalli Hills? Well, if you haven’t done this till now, here’s the opportunity to feel this beauty and start a life of your own with your loved ones. With the success of Signature Global Park 1 the Group is all set to launch Signature Global Park 1 Phase 2 in Sohna, South of Gurugram. This is a project that will help you relish the natural beauty and rejuvenate you from within.


Signature Global Park 1 Phase 2 is a luxurious set of independent floors project and has been developed on the same cords as of the previous one. The project is being developed under Deen Dayal Jan Awas Yojna. These low rise premium floors in Sohna  are considerably apt for the ones who desire to live an independent and private life. Unlike other residential categories, this project allows to enjoy the green acres under a boundless blue sky – far away from the city’s pollution.


Total number of units available in the second phase of Signature Global Park 1, Gurgaon is 152. This is a project that comes with a configuration of 2 and 3 BHK in a stilt + 4 structures. It ensures that the property is not over crowded and is free from unnecessary attentions. The Signature Global Park 1 Phase 2, Gurgaon is an Edge Certified project and possesses features and qualities that make these homes Green Homes. Come let’s check out the important specifications that one gets on buying this amazingly planned project.


Key Features of Green Homes

  • Energy-efficient Walls
  • Natural Ventilation
  • Operational Energy Saving Features
  • Optimum Window-to-wall Ratio (WWR)
  • Reflective Roof
  • High Thermal Performance Windows
  • Water Saving Features
  • Low Flow Water Closet
  • Low Flow Water Fixtures (taps, showerheads)
  • Rainwater Harvesting
  • Waste Water Treatment & Reuse
  • Embodied Energy Saving Features
  • Low Embodied Energy Materials (walls, floor & roof slab, flooring & window frames) and many more such features

In order to make these features work effectively, the Group has Padma Bhushan Awardee Architect Hafeez Contractor in the team who looks after the design part. The entire project sprawls across 5 acres of land parcel and is surrounded by a lush green environment. Special preferences for nature and natural resources have been given in this project which makes this project a sustainable and eco-friendly residence. It is an apt example of independent living that can be tailored to your taste and requirements. Featuring superb connectivity, high-tech infrastructure and modern amenities, this Signature Global Park 1 Phase 2 in Sohna, South of Gurugram provides everything a contemporary home could possibly need.


Location Advantages

These independent floors project in Gurugram is a masterpiece not only with respect to the lavish structure, features and amenities but also in context with the excellent location advantages. Located in the Southern part of Gurugram, this location has several advantages that make it a looked-for place to live and do business. Be its proximity to Delhi or major localities of Gurugram or access to major highways, the South of Gurugram is considerably the best locality for the daily commuters and investors.


The location where Signature Global Park 1 Phase 2 in Sohna is located happens to be a prime area where two major roadways, the Delhi-Mumbai Industrial Corridor (DMIC) and the Sohna Elevated Road, are equidistant and in close proximity. A daily traveller working in Gurugram can easily reach his/her destination within a time frame of 20-25 minutes via the Sohna elevated road. Other routes and social infrastructures linked well to the project have been mentioned below.

Apart from the strategic location and planned infrastructure, these premium floors in Sohna, Gurgaon, are also rich in contemporary amenities. There are approx. 25+ amenities are available in this property. These will certainly help you enjoy your weekends, extra hours and holidays with your loved ones. Sitting in a Gazebo surrounded by beautiful flowers and their fragrances will ease your mind and soul. You can enjoy the pool deck while your kids learn to swim. Similarly, there is more that you can do in Signature Global Park 1 Phase 2 in Sohna. Check out the list of these amenities to get a better idea.


  • Dedicated Lifts for Stilt + 4 Floors
  • Dedicated Car Parking
  • Swimming Pool
  • Classic Themed Kids’ Pool
  • Pool Deck
  • Kids’ Play Area
  • Badminton Court
  • Skating Rink
  • Half Basketball Court
  • Multipurpose Central Lawn
  • Cricket Net Practice Pitch
  • Outdoor Gym
  • Sculpture Court
  • Gazebo
  • Jogging Track
  • Pathway of 2 km Along Road
  • Yoga & Meditation Lawn
  • Reflexology Path
  • Performance Court
  • Sitting Under Trellis
  • Deck Loungers Under Trellis
  • Garden Pavilion
  • Open – Air Theatre (Oat)
  • Water Spouts
  • Pathway Through Portals
  • Community Party Lawn

In addition to the facilities, these independent premium floors in Sohna have top-notch specs. Everything used, including the kitchen countertops, exterior doors and windows, wiring, switches, and sockets, paints, fittings, and fixtures, is of the highest quality and brand names. Kajaria, Jaquar, Polycab, Cartsil, Asian Paints, Dorset, Saint-Gobain, OTIS, Hindware, Syska, and Bajaj are just a handful of the notable brands products of which are being used in this Signature Global project. In a nutshell, this project is the ideal fusion of luxury and comfort packed together to provide you with the greatest living experience.
